alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 11 at 10:31AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of central West Virginia, including the following counties, Nicholas and Webster. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1024 AM EDT, Runoff will continue to result in flooding of of some creeks. There are reports of small creeks out of their banks in and around Craigsville. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Cherry Run, Rockcamp Run, Buffalo Creek, Glade Creek, Big Beaver Creek, Turkey Creek, and Coon Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Camden-On-gauley, Craigsville, Camden On Gauley, Calvin and Muddlety. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
